Sentencas: The focus of this study is the measurement and understanding of the sulfur poisoning phenomena of Ni/gadolinium-doped ceria (CGO) based solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: Cells with Ni/CGO10 and NiCu5/CGO40 anodes were characterized by using impedance spectroscopy at different temperatures and H-2/H2O fuel ratios.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The short-term sulfur poisoning behavior was investigated systematically at temperatures of 800-950 degrees C, current densities of 0-0.75 Acm(-2), and H2S concentrations of 1-20 ppm.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: A sulfur poisoning mitigation effect was observed at high current loads and temperatures.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: The poisoning behavior was reversible for short exposure times.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: It was observed that the sulfur-affected processes exhibited significantly different relaxation times that depend on the Gd content in the CGO phase.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes

Sentencas: Moreover, it was demonstrated that the capacitance of Ni/CGO10 anodes is strongly dependent on the temperature and gas-phase composition, which reflects a changing Ce3+/Ce4+ ratio.
Titulo: Evaluation of the Effect of Sulfur on the Performance of Nickel/Gadolinium-Doped Ceria Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anodes
